website_summaries.verdict: Premium fish finding option with the ultimate suite of handy features to make fishing easier.
pros: Built-in GPS allows for pinpoint water navigation and way point creation to mark different spots
Create and store maps with specialized software
Finding can be controlled via an app on the phone with the built-in WiFi

customer_reviews.title: Don't go by the picture.... there are no maps.
customer_reviews.text: wish I would have looked at reviews... GPS with Contour mapping.. apparently means no GPS mapping. it slapped in easy and the sonar is great but the vast yellow screen with no map except a trail of where you have been threw me until I looked at the reviews... Was very frustrated... just saw the map on the amazon item marketing and assumed the unit was a chart plotter and sonar combo. My mistake.. .but I still rated it low for false advertising. I would have sent it back but it was installed and after the 30 day return policy before I ran my boat...
customer_reviews.author: petesmart

customer_reviews.title: Data transfer is sub optimal
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial shrimper.I use only Garmin combo units.They are good durable units,but they stored memory on SD cards and were easy to transfer waypoints and tracks.I'm no tech Guru but I can follow instructions.I spent quite a few hours trying to get the data transferd from my 2012 GPSMAP 541 s SD card on to my new Striker 7 plus sv. It's a beautiful unit and I can't wait to put it to work but I'm waiting for my 17 yo son to figure out how to transfer data into Active Captain app and to the Striker 7 sv plus.If any of you have 17 yo sons there isn't a problem. Overall Garmin is great stuff. Capt. Doc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but the product don’t come with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the product don’t come with a user manual. Had to down load manual and buy a 3 ring binder
customer_reviews.author: thomas gianchetti

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: No gps only fish founder ,to much money for founder only
customer_reviews.author: Haychell

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, easy to read, even in bright sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: I use this finder on my 185 Bass Tracker. It works well and is easy to use and is accurate. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Curley

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very good. Will order again when run out
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product user friendly. Packaged well and will be ordering a few more when I get the money for kayak and other boat
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised! Super simple to set up, arrived Friday at 8 pm had wires run and transom tapped ready for fishing opener. Took nothing but a couple of minutes on the water to figure out the user friendly interface. If your on the fence about purchasing one there's an abundance of tutorials and videos on YouTube. It was either this or the Humminbird 7 and I'm very pleased with my choice running the Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent system. The unit is responsive and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent system. The unit is responsive and easy to use. I have it installed on a Wilderness Systems Radar 115's Flex Pod OS and I feel that I will need to take it into deeper waters to experience to the side view function cause I'm not sure if the transducer is deep enough below the hull. Other that than, it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: BigGulpsHuh

customer_reviews.title: No gps, misleading add
customer_reviews.text: So going out on the boat I realize this has no GPS no Maps. When you look at the advertisement it clearly hints that it has GPS and all that stuff. Now I'm in fear of returning this item because there is a restocking fee of almost $250. Beware hopefully Amazon a-to-z guarantee will not allow that. I read the reviews and I didn't believe them because Garmin is such a great company. But you cannot download Maps you cannot add a chip SD card nothing it is a expensive fishing screen and that's it
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Beware on returning item.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the garmin but i did not like that it didn't have GPS installed. That's is sold separately. And also beware on returning this item through the seller. There a $100+ restocking .. I wasent happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: santos

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to install and very user friendly. First time using a fish finder and this one is incredibly intuitive. Great price for the down and side view. Was a little concerned about installation as is never done it before but the instructions were very clear and straight forward. Look forward to catching some fish!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bentley

customer_reviews.title: no maps and cannot download them
customer_reviews.text: misleading information. you cannot download maps from active captain but must create your own. not a fun way to find out the depth is 2 ft. unusable gps for anywhere near a reef.
customer_reviews.author: texasrocks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Beautiful Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, attached on the boat perfectly, easily and exceeds my expectations. Looks beautiful and although I have only used it once (everything is closed due to pandemic) it performed exactly as I needed. As soon as life gets back to "normal" I can't wait to go out on the boat and find my spots easily!
customer_reviews.author: Supernova Freya

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this fishfinder
customer_reviews.text: Amazing display of fish and the bottom. The mapping feature is very useful. The only thing missing is a touch screen but the price it has lots of features. Love this locater
customer_reviews.author: fishfearme

customer_reviews.title: ActiveCaption is useless on this model. Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: Active captain app is useless with this item. The description is misleading. there is no helm option with the striker models even though their own website only lists echomap models without this function. So no screen share or controls from connected devices. Wifi is only useful for them to collect your data to sell back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Russo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fish finder and enjoy the detail on down and side imagine
customer_reviews.author: TCfishing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's like looking at a video of what's under your boat. Extremely clear..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too technical for us
customer_reviews.text: We found no maps or GPS. It is just too difficult to use for people that are not tech savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda OLeary

customer_reviews.title: No map data
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that you paid 500 for it and doesn't have any maps bs
customer_reviews.author: Sean friedman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving it. Very easy install on the trolling motor. Very simple menu system will have you on the water in minutes. It starts up pretty much instantly unlike my Lowrance. Large screen is very bright and clear. Side view is interesting. Not sure how much I'll use it in our lake, but did find a sunk boat I didn't know about. Overall very nice. I don't need charts on our inland lakes, so saving several hundred over the chart versions from Lowrance, Hummingbird, and Garmin was fine with me. The Quickdraw feature is getting a workout mapping our lake where commercial charts don't exist anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit, Poor Literature
customer_reviews.text: Love this fish finder, but Garmin really needs to supply far better instructional material in how to read it, ie. How to find thermocline...how to interpret screen output. All fish finders are different, and this is no exception. Would love to see a comprehensive manual showing a wide range of actual screen shots with detailed explanations of what you are seeing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich K

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Beautiful clear screen, good options, easy navigation, good price. The contour recording works well and keeps recording even if you leave the screen while your fishing. Installed easily on the MinnKota Maxxum trolling motor with supplied mount. I added a RAM Mount and Tempered Glass cover which is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product but keep in mind that while it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but keep in mind that while it has GPS there is no navionics only waypoints. You have to go to the ecomap version to get nav
customer_reviews.author: Savman

customer_reviews.title: Maps/Charts Catch 22 cycle
customer_reviews.text: Maps/Charts downloads are the responsibility of the purchaser to download. Garman has a chronic issue with its server not being able to be reached - thus NO maps or charts can be downloaded. They are so aware of the flaw and yet do nothing to fix it. I would not buy from Garman unless I knew for sure that the maps/charts were loaded prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first depth finder we have ever owned and we love it!! The ease of use is amazing and the clarity and functions are excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: coolbean

customer_reviews.title: No maps
customer_reviews.text: Great depth finder/ fish finder. Should of came with garmin cover, and would be mice to be able to upload maps. Otherwise pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: dalhas

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok.... for a year
customer_reviews.text: This unit did more than what we needed it to do and worked OK for 13 months. Then we lost all signal and unit said the transducer was bad. Contacted Garmin but because it was more than the 1 year warranty period they advised me to buy another unit. $400 down the drain. Thanks Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: don't buy, no maps
customer_reviews.text: No basic map. Do not buy, community maps are garbage, quick draw map gives you little too nothing. Wasted my money, buy hummingbird
customer_reviews.author: michael c zorzi

product_meta.title: Garmin Striker 7SV with Transducer, 7" GPS Fishfinder with Chirp Traditional, ClearVu and SideVu Scanning Sonar Transducer and Built in Quickdraw Contours Mapping Software, 7 inches (010-01874-00)
product_meta.description: The striker Plus 7sv Fishfinder with a bright 7” display and built-in GPS features Garmin Quickdraw contours map drawing software, which stores up to 2 million acres of content with 1’ contours. Garmin CHIRP traditional sonar provides crystal-clear images with remarkable target separation. Get nearly photographic images of what passes below and beside your boat with CHIRP Clearly and CHIRP SideVü scanning sonars. Use Built-in Wi-Fi to pair with the ActiveCaptain app for smart notifications, access to Quickdraw Contours community data and more.
feature_bullets: Includes transducer for built-in Garmin CHIRP traditional sonar plus CHIRP ClearVü and CHIRP SideVü scanning sonars
Built-in Quickdraw Contours mapping software lets you create and store maps with 1’ contours for up to 2 million acres. Resolution : 800 x 480
Built-in Wi-Fi for access to ActiveCaptain app so you can receive smart notifications, access Quickdraw Contours Community and transfer waypoints and software update notifications
Built-in GPS lets you mark waypoints, create routes and view boat’s speed. Transmit power - 500 W (RMS)
Bright, sunlight-readable 7” display and intuitive user interface

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: STRIKER Plus 7sv, CV52HW-TM transducer, 4-pin to 12-pin transducer adapter cable, transom and trolling motor mounts, power/data cable, tilt/swivel mount and documentation
